#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb push_back
#define pii pair <int, int>
#define MOD 1000000007
#define mp make_pair
#define F first
#define S second
#define ll long long
#define maxs 100005
#define iosbase ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false)
#define sc scanf
#define pr printf
#define null NULL
#define getcx getchar_unlocked
using namespace std;
#define size 350
ll dp[maxs][size];
int main(){
	int t;
	sc("%d", &t);
		dp[0][0]=1;
		int p=sqrt(100000);
		p++;
		for(int i=1;i<=p;i++){
			dp[1][i]=1;
		}
		for(int i=2; i<=100000; i++){
			dp[i][0]=0;
			for(int j=1; j<=p; j++){
				dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j]+dp[i][j-1];
				dp[i][j]%=MOD;
			}
		}
		
		int n,k;
	while(t--){
		sc("%d %d", &n, &k);
		if(n==1){
			printf("-1\n");
			continue;
		}
		ll ans=0;
		for(int i=1;i*i<=k;i++){
		//	cout<<dp[n-1][k/i]<<" ";
			ans+=dp[n-1][i]*(k/i-i+1);
			ans%=MOD;
		}
		printf("%lld\n", ans);
	}
}
